name: NUA.exe
description:
NUA.EXE 

A clicker game made in 2 weeks for the NUA game jam -

This project adopts stylized visuals, an interactive environment, and a retentive gameplay loop that satirically encapsulates our time at Norwich University of the Arts. 

CREDITS 

- Rhys Anthony

- Cal Forrester

- James Fry 

- Joshua Love

NOTES

This project is in development, and the released version does not support any form of progress saving. 

We hope that the current gameplay demonstrates the direction this game would be taken should further development take place. Besides that, have fun!
